author: Barry Roche
title: People realise checkpoints necessary to stop spread of virus, gardaí say
description: Gardaí ask people to have essential work letter ready to show at checkpoints
content:
Members of the public realise that garda checkpoints have an important part to play in curbing the spread of the virus, a garda in charge of Covid-19 checkpoints in Cork has said.
Garda Powers and his colleagues had set up a diversion in the M8 near the Glan… [+2802 chars]
